title: [Feat]: Option to start minimized to tray.
body:
### Describe the feature

When starting up Teams for Linux, have a setting that makes it only start minimized to tray.

### Motivation

Teams for Linux is one of the windows that I have set on my work profile to auto-open. To reduce clutter and maintain a cleaner working environment, I like to start it minimized using the --minimized flag on the startup command. However, this was not trivial to find as it is not exposed anywhere in the UI.
